tool_description: Evaluates the overall effectiveness of skincare routines by analyzing outcomes, goal achievement, and return on investment in time and money.

routine_duration.description: How long routine has been followed in weeks

time_investment.description: Daily time spent on routine in minutes

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: initial_goals and goal_achievement must have same length
Invalid achievement percentage: Each goal achievement must be 0-100
Invalid satisfaction rating: Must be integer between 1-10
Insufficient routine duration: Need at least 4 weeks for meaningful evaluation
Invalid time investment: Time must be positive integer
Invalid cost: Cost must be positive number if provided
usage: Input routine duration, initial goals with achievement percentages, satisfaction rating, time investment, and optionally cost. Tool provides comprehensive effectiveness analysis.

overall_effectiveness.description: Overall effectiveness rating: excellent, good, fair, poor

continue_or_modify.description: Recommendation to continue, modify, or overhaul routine
